p:
Nanoemulsion is one of the nanostructures which can be formulated within the droplet size range of 20–200 nm and has with a higher kinetic stability suggesting that it will exhibit stability during storage. Nanoemulsion, a step towards nanoencapsulation, is formulated through emulsification of oily and aqueous phases using an emulsifier coating molecule
11 . Nanocapsules have been formulated using biodegradable polymers as wall materials, including whey protein
12 , sodium caseinate
13 and modified starch or maltodextrin
14 .
